TopicTitle: Show off your awesome KSP pictures!

Articles.Content:
Dont you hate when you are planning a two seater launch with one pilot, revert to vab in order to edit one missing detail, and BOOM, a second Kerbal just got into the cockpit... my space program has a certain procedure for them:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Dont you hate when you are planning a two seater launch with one pilot, revert to vab in order to edit one missing detail, and BOOM, a second Kerbal just got into the cockpit... my space program has a certain procedure for them:

http://imgur.com/a/M61uB

I know how you feel, but... but.. you monster!

Here a promise made is a debt unpaid, i bring to you The Moho strand.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Dont you hate when you are planning a two seater launch with one pilot, revert to vab in order to edit one missing detail, and BOOM, a second Kerbal just got into the cockpit... my space program has a certain procedure for them:

-snip-

This inspires me.

I know how you feel, but... but.. you monster!

Its a standard procedure that ensures i am keeping the strongest

This inspires me.

and if he gets into orbit, he will evapack inside of the ship, and will be awarded the badass badge from the finalfrontier addon. so far three kerbals have managed the feat, while countless others have gone on later missions. With mild extreme crushing geeforce trauma and some deep psych damage, and let me stress that word -mild-

And to keep the thread on track, here is my second Midway station on HKO, the first one was eaten by the kraken along with the old save.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

And to keep the thread on track, here is my second Midway station on HKO, the first one was eaten by the kraken along with the old save.

http://imgur.com/a/ufIRx

That one was just edited and added the pics after it was completed, it now counts with a lab and a crew transport.

This was supposed to be a retirement and leisure place for the most condecorated kerbals.

Have you ever braked so hard that your whole monster rover breakdances? I bet we all have.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Suddenly found all the Kerbals I've ever killed in my space program on the floor of a secret crater on the Mun.

Suddenly found all the Kerbals I've ever killed in my space program on the floor of a secret crater on the Mun.

*snip*

They seem to be silently judging you.

They seem to be silently judging you.

Judge? Why would they? I did everything in my power to keep them safe. I promise!

Judge? Why would they? I did everything in my power to keep them safe. I promise!

Obviously you didn't try hard enough because they're dead.

You murdered them. For science. You monster.

Judge? Why would they? I did everything in my power to keep them safe. I promise!

I see a lot of nonplussed glances. You could probably improve their outlook if you invested the resources to at least deliver a shipload of snacks. It doesn't take much to make Kerbals smile, after all.
KSN Spirit of Kerbin, the pride of the Kerbal space navy, leaving Kerbin for Dres. >50k delta-v, <3 the interstellar mod.

LetÃ‚Â´s lighten up the mood from those poor famished green castaways. I wonder if you make and launch space-only vessels, the sort that arenÃ‚Â´t meant to return from space?

and i have been seeing your complex battleships deadweasel, and i think i can remember zookesia too. No hyperedit right?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

http://i.imgur.com/uIvQrms.jpg

KSN Spirit of Kerbin, the pride of the Kerbal space navy, leaving Kerbin for Dres. >50k delta-v, <3 the interstellar mod.

IsnÃ‚Â´t that ring from H.O.M.E.? i cant seem to get those parts to work

LetÃ‚Â´s lighten up the mood from those poor famished green castaways. I wonder if you make and launch space-only vessels, the sort that arenÃ‚Â´t meant to return from space?

The vessel I've posted above was launched in one piece* atop a KW rocketry/NovaPunch rocket, and given its shape and weight, it's obviously not meant to ever return to Kerbin surface.

*excluding a small Dres lander currently attached to the side of it.

IsnÃ‚Â´t that ring from H.O.M.E.? i cant seem to get those parts to work

Nah, that's the one from the Habitat Pack (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64442-0-23-5-Habitat-Pack-v0-4), it works like a charm, better than any other KSP centrifuge I'm aware of. The only drawback is that since it is inflatable, you can't attach anything to its sides.

That would be no problem for me, actually i am using this one that spins:

itÃ‚Â´s the one beneath the stock cuppola above everything else

Edited May 9, 2014 by Joecool

Pointy trees = aerodynamic.Yes.

Landing!

Best flag.

Sonsel: "Enemy drone on the radar! Changing course, they're going to ram us!"

Dudcal: "How are they not fooled by our brilliant disguise?"

Sonsel: "We have only one option here. We must use lethal force."

Fzzzch!

Dudcal: "Target destroyed."

Sonsel: "Now, we must hide in this crater until we can be sure it is safe."

Dudcal: "Oh no!"

Is this the End for Stealth Rover!?!

Edited May 9, 2014 by Tw1

I see a lot of nonplussed glances. You could probably improve their outlook if you invested the resources to at least deliver a shipload of snacks. It doesn't take much to make Kerbals smile, after all.

Dead Kerbals consume no snacks. As soon as a Kerbal signs up for my space program, they're legally considered dead. This is why most of my astronauts are condemned prisoners.

Anyhow, as my space program is obviously beyond redemption, I might as well expand that body pile a little. After all, it could be bigger!

Edited May 9, 2014 by Felsmak

Ah, the one from LLL. I also have it installed, but haven't tried to orbit it yet, must be a pain with FAR installed. Also, IIRC the one from LLL spins non-stop, even in the VAB, right? The one from the habitat pack is cool in that you can start and stop the rotation on demand, LLL should really think about something like that.
